Title: Relates to the imposition of penalties and remedies in suits brought for the vindication of civil rights or human rights
Summary: Relates to the imposition of penalties and remedies in suits brought for the vindication of civil rights or human rights.
LawCode: Ren Art 10 §§100 & 101 to be Art 11 §§110 & 111, add Art 10 §100, Civ Rts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil rights law, in relation to the imposition of penalties and remedies in suits brought for the vindication of civil rights or human rights
